name: StarLight - Test hand speed
description:
StarLight is an absolutely addictive game! You never wanna miss it!

You will be a lonely star, looking for the light from other stars in the universe.

Easy to play
Control the moving direction of the blue star by tapping the screen to catch the other shining stars.

What are you waiting for? Download now and test your hand speed!
